name: Panther Parry

sections.name: Prerequisites
sections.description: Wis 15, Combat Reflexes, Improved Unarmed Strike, Panther Claw, Panther Style.

sections.body: While using Panther Style, your retaliatory unarmed strikes are resolved before the triggering attacks. If your retaliatory unarmed strike deals damage to an opponent, that opponent takes a –2 penalty on attack and damage rolls with the triggering attack of opportunity.
sections.name: Benefits

description: Your vicious strikes impair your foe's ability to attack you when you move.
